translation.en: One, two, three!
♪ Take off ♪ ♪ Last stop ♪
♪ Countdown till we blast open the top ♪
♪ Face first ♪ ♪ Full charge ♪
translation.fr: La tête la première, pleine charge

translation.en: ♪ Electric hammer to the heart ♪
♪ Clocks move faster ♪
♪ 'Cause it's all we're after now ♪
♪ Won't stop climbing ♪
♪ 'Cause this is our time, yeah ♪
♪ When all the days felt black and white ♪
translation.fr: Les jours en noir et blanc

translation.en: ♪ Those were the best shades of my life ♪
translation.fr: Étaient les meilleurs jours de ma vie

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising ♪
♪ Up right now ♪
♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
♪ We'll still fly ♪
♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.fr: Rêve comme si on vivait pour toujours

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.fr: Vis comme si c'étaitMaintenant ou jamais

translation.en: ♪ We ain't searching for tomorrow ♪
♪ Tomorrow ♪
♪ 'Cause we got all we need today ♪
translation.fr: On a tout ce qu'il faut aujourd'hui

translation.en: ♪ Today ♪
♪ Living on a feeling ♪
♪ That's been running through our veins ♪
♪ We're the revolution ♪
♪ That's been singing in the rain ♪
translation.fr: Qui se chante sous la pluie

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising up right now ♪
translation.fr: Car on s'élève On touche les étoiles

translation.en: ♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
♪ We'll still fly ♪
♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.fr: Rêve comme si on vivait pour toujours

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.fr: Vis comme si c'étaitMaintenant ou jamais

translation.en: ♪ It's now or never ♪
♪ Now or never ♪
-[girl 1] Whoo! Excellent! -[guy] Sounds great, guys!
Thank you! We're Sunset Curve!
translation.fr: Merci ! On est les Sunset Curve.

translation.en: Too bad we wasted the tightest we've played on sound check!
Wait until tonight, man, when this place gets packed with record execs.
translation.fr: Attends ce soir. Il y aura plein de producteurs.

translation.en: Alex, you were smoking.
translation.fr: Alex, tu as cassé la baraque.

translation.en: Oh no. I was just warming up. You guys were the ones on fire.
translation.fr: C'était juste un échauffement.Vous avez déchiré.

translation.en: Could you just own your awesomeness for once?
-All right, I was killing it. -[chuckles]
OK, well, I'm thinking we fuel up before the show. I'm thinking street dogs.
translation.fr: Mangeons un morceau avant le concert. Hot dogs ?

translation.en: -Ooh! -Yes.
Hey, Bobby, where you going?
I'm good.
Vegetarian. I could never hurt an animal.
You guys are really good.
Thank you.
I see a lot of bands.
Been in a couple myself. I was really feeling it.
translation.fr: J'en ai même fait partie d'un.C'était top.

translation.en: That's what we do this for. I'm Luke, by the way.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'on fait ça.Je suis Luke.

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Reggie. -Alex.
Nice meeting you guys.
I'm Rose.
here's our demo.
And a T-shirt. Size beautiful.
translation.fr: Et un T-shirt. En taille canon.

translation.en: Thanks.
I'll make sure not to wipe the tables down with this one.
translation.fr: Je n'essuierai pas les tables avec.

translation.en: Oh, good call. Whenever they get wet, they just kinda fall apart in your hands.
translation.fr: Tant mieux. Quand ils sont mouillés,ils se déforment.

translation.en: Don't you guys have to go get hot dogs?
Yeah, he had a hamburger for lunch.
translation.fr: Il a mangé un hamburger au déjeuner.

translation.en: -That's what I'm talking about! -[Reggie chuckles]
The smell of Sunset Boulevard?
No. [chuckles]
It's what that girl said in there tonight.
translation.fr: Ce que cette fille a dit ce soir.

translation.en: About our music, all right? It's like an energy.
translation.fr: Sur notre musique.C'est comme une énergie

translation.en: It connects us with people.
They can feel us when we play.
I want that connection with everybody.
translation.fr: Je veux établir ce lienavec tout le monde.

translation.en: Then we're gonna need more T-shirts.
Let's go, boys.
Ladies.
Reggie, wait! [girl 1 squeals]
-[girl 2] Oh my God. Reggie! -[girl 1] Oh my God! Hi, it's me!
translation.fr: - Mon Dieu, Reggie !- Reggie, c'est moi !

translation.en: Man... I can't wait until we eat someplace
translation.fr: J'ai hâte qu'on mange dans un endroit

translation.en: where the condiments aren't served out of the back of an Oldsmobile.
translation.fr: où le service ne se fait pasà l'arrière d'un tacot.

translation.en: Hey... Sorry, I got some pickle juice on your battery cables.
translation.fr: Désolé, j'ai mis du jus de cornichonsur les câbles de votre batterie.

translation.en: No problem. It'll help with the rust.
-That can't... -[man chuckles]
OK. What?
This is awesome, you guys.
We're playing The Orpheum!
I can't even count how many bands have played here
translation.fr: Je sais pas combien de groupesont joué ici.

translation.en: and then ended up being huge.
We're gonna be legends!
Eat up, boys.
'Cause after tonight,  everything changes.
translation.fr: Après ce soir, tout va changer.

translation.en: That's a new flavor.
Chill, man. Street dogs haven't killed us yet.
translation.fr: Relax, c'est un hot dog, pas du poison.

translation.en: Hey, underachiever.
Hey, disappointment.
OK, I know you don't want me to ask, but have you figured out
translation.fr: Je ne devrais pas te demander, mais tu vas faire quoi ?

translation.en: -what you're gonna do today? -I'll know in the moment.
translation.fr: mais tu vas faire quoi ? On verra le moment venu.

translation.en: Really, Jules?
That's all you're giving me?
Mrs. Harrison said this is your last chance.
translation.fr: Selon Harrison, c'est ta dernière chance.

translation.en: I know.
I was there.
-[sighs] -[girl] See you at the rally!
Ugh! What is she handing out?
-Hi! -Desperation?
Here you go. My group's performing at the spirit rally tomorrow.
translation.fr: Tiens. Mon groupe se produitau rassemblement demain.

translation.en: I'm sure you guys have nothing better to do.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez sûrementrien de mieux à faire.

translation.en: [sarcastically] Oh my gosh, Carrie. Thanks!
Oh my gosh, Flynn. Don't bother coming!
translation.fr: Mon Dieu, Flynn. Inutile de venir !

translation.en: Here you go.
[Carrie] Come see Dirty Candy tomorrow.
Nick?
[Flynn] Still?
You know they're gonna get married and have a bunch of unholy babies.
translation.fr: Ils vont se marieret auront plein de bébés.

translation.en: Nick's a sweetheart.
You'd actually have to talk to him to know that.
translation.fr: Tu devrais lui parler pour savoir.

translation.en: And only one of them has to be a demon to make a demon baby.
translation.fr: Un seul doit être un démonpour faire un bébé démon.

translation.en: Demon!
There's that smile. Now, let's go prove everybody wrong.
translation.fr: Enfin un sourire.Allons tous les détromper.

translation.en: Nice job, Nick.
Almost as impressive as your game against Glendale.
translation.fr: Aussi bon que ton match contre Glendale.

translation.en: OK, we have one last performance. [claps] Julie?
translation.fr: Bien. Nous avons une dernière performance.Julie ?

translation.en: Take your time.
I'm sorry.
Is this when we clap?
Watch it, Carrie.
Oh good. You're home.
I was about to go watch your brother's game.
translation.fr: J'allais voir le match de ton frère.

translation.en: I've had photo shoots all day. Didn't even get a chance to eat.
translation.fr: J'ai fait des photos toute la journée.J'ai pas mangé.

translation.en: But... I got a phone call today.
translation.fr: Mais... j'ai reçu un appel aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Yeah, I figured as much.
Yeah.
-Well, it was my Realtor friend. -Oh, that.
translation.fr: - De mon amie agent immobilier.- Oh, ça.

translation.en: Yeah, and she says if we are serious about selling the house,
translation.fr: Elle dit que si on veutvraiment vendre la maison,

translation.en: then she wants me to take some pictures for the website.
translation.fr: je dois prendre des photospour le site web.

translation.en: Which means we have to do a lot of cleaning
translation.fr: Ce qui veut dire qu'on doit nettoyer

translation.en: and get rid of some stuff.
And maybe you can... tackle Mom's studio?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais peut-être t'occuperdu studio de maman ?

translation.en: You're the expert.
You know, your brother and I wouldn't even know where to begin.
translation.fr: Ton frère et moi,on ne saurait pas par où commencer.

translation.en: It's OK, honey. If you're not ready, I--
translation.fr: Chérie, si tu le sens pas...

translation.en: No. It's all right.
Maybe I'll try tonight.
Yeah? [claps]
Awesome, mija. Thank you.
Oh, and don't forget the loft.
You know, those old instruments that were there when we moved in?
translation.fr: Ces instruments étaient làbien avant nous.

translation.en: They need a new home.
Mom would like that.
[dad] Yeah, she would.
Oh God. I'm gonna be late.
Under the mail.
[snaps fingers] You're a lifesaver.
I'm so sorry, Mom.
That I haven't been here.
How did we get back here?
-Dad! -[dad] Whoa! Hey!
Whoa! Slow down. You look like you've seen a ghost.
translation.fr: Du calme. Tu as vu un fantôme ?

translation.en: -I have! -Cool.
Not cool! [grunts]
Run! [grunts]
[sighs] Come on, Flynn.  911 means 911!
Why aren't you answering me? [exhales sharply]
-[dad] Hey. -[Julie screams]
-[Julie] Dad. -Sorry.
Just wanted to make sure you were OK.
translation.fr: Je voulais m'assurer que ça allait.

translation.en: You don't believe me, do you?
translation.fr: Tu ne me crois pas, hein ?

translation.en: Honey, of course I do. Mija, I see your mom all the time.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que si. Je vois ta mère tout le temps.

translation.en: This isn't like that.
I know. It's different for all of us.
Dad, you're not listening to me.
I saw something out there.
All right. OK. OK.
I'm listening.
Tell me what you saw. It's just you and me here.
translation.fr: Dis-moi ce que tu as vu.Entre toi et moi.

translation.en: [sighs] You sound just like Dr. Turner.
Well, maybe seeing Dr. Turner again isn't such a bad idea.
translation.fr: Revoir le Dr Turnern'est pas une si mauvaise idée.

translation.en: Dad!
Can we just drop it?
All right.
Dropped.
[dad] We good?
Yeah.
Are you still here...
[exhales shakily] ...whatever you are?
I know I saw something. I'm not crazy.
translation.fr: J'ai vu quelque chose.Je ne suis pas folle.

translation.en: Well, we're all a little crazy.
translation.fr: On est tous un peu fous.

translation.en: Oh my God! Please stop screaming!
Who are you, and what are you doing in my mom's studio?
translation.fr: Que faites-vousdans le studio de ma mère ?

translation.en: Your mom's studio? This is our studio. Trust me, my...
translation.fr: Le studio de ta mère ?C'est notre studio. Crois-moi, mon…

translation.en: The grand piano is new, and... and... and ...
translation.fr: Le piano à queue est neuf et…

translation.en: [giggling] My couch!
That is definitely not my six-string.
Can you give me just one second?
translation.fr: Pardon, j'en ai pour une minute.

translation.en: Just... give me a second. Thank you.
Guys, what is going on? How did she get her stuff in here so fast?
translation.fr: Il se passe quoi ? Comment elle a installéses affaires si vite ?

translation.en: Maybe... maybe she's a witch. There's chairs floating on the ceiling.
translation.fr: C'est peut-être une sorcière.Il y a des chaises au plafond.

translation.en: OK, there is no such thing as witches.
You sure? I used to think there was no such thing as ghosts.
translation.fr: Je pensais que les fantômesn'existaient pas.

translation.en: That's fair.
OK, so we're going with witch?
No! We are not going with witch.
She's not a witch. OK, look. She's just scared.
translation.fr: C'est pas une sorcière. Elle a peur.

translation.en: OK? Let someone with a softer touch handle this.
translation.fr: OK ? Laisse quelqu'unavec plus de finesse se charger de ça.

translation.en: Why are you in our studio?
Oh my gosh! How did you do that?
translation.fr: Mon Dieu ! Comment tu as fait ?

translation.en: Clearly, you're not understanding... She doesn't get it.
translation.fr: Tu ne comprends pas. Elle pige pas.

translation.en: OK, look. We're ghosts, all right?
translation.fr: OK. On est des fantômes. D'accord ?

translation.en: We're just three ghosts, and we're really happy to be home.
translation.fr: Trois fantômes heureux d'être chez eux.

translation.en: So, thank you for the flowers. They really brighten up the room.
translation.fr: Alors, merci pour les fleurs.Elles éclairent la pièce.

translation.en: -We're in a band called Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.fr: - On est les Sunset Curve.- Parle de nous.

translation.en: Last night was supposed to be a really big night for us.
translation.fr: Hier devait être une grande soirée.

translation.en: It was gonna change our lives.
I'm, uh... I'm pretty sure it did.
This is freaking me out. [breathes sharply, grunts]
-What is that? What are you doing? -It's my phone.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? Tu fais quoi ?- Mon téléphone.

translation.en: No! Stop talking to them. They aren't real.
translation.fr: Leur parle pas. Ils sont pas réels.

translation.en: -There's no such thing as cute ghosts. -Oh, think we're cute?
translation.fr: - Les fantômes mignons existent pas.- On est mignons ?

translation.en: -[Julie taps keys] -Who you calling? I'm Googling Sunset Swerve.
translation.fr: - Tu appelles qui ?- Je cherche Sunset Crève.

translation.en: [all] Sunset Curve!
[Julie] Whoa.
There is a Sunset Curve.
translation.fr: Il y a un Sunset Curve.

translation.en: You did die.
But not last night.
Twenty-five years ago?
What? No. No, no, no. Th-Th-That's impossible.
After we floated out of the ambulance,
all we did was go to that weird, dark room where Alex cried.
translation.fr: à cette pièce sombre où Alex pleurait.

translation.en: [high-pitched] Well... I don't think...
I think we were all pretty upset. OK.
But that was just for like an hour.
translation.fr: Ça a duré juste une heure.

translation.en: We just showed up here.
Look. I'm just telling you what my phone says.
translation.fr: Je vous dis justece que dit mon téléphone.

translation.en: See? You died in 1995.
translation.fr: Vous voyez ? Vous êtes morts en 1995.

translation.en: When you were 17.
It's now 2020.
So, this is the future?
Wait. So... So, it has been 25 years.
I have been crying for 25 years? How is that possible?
translation.fr: Je pleure depuis 25 ans ? - C'est pas possible.- Tu pleures beaucoup.

translation.en: -Well, you're a very emotional person. -I am not!
translation.fr: - C'est pas possible.- Tu pleures beaucoup. C'est pas vrai !

translation.en: [boy] Thought you were afraid to come out here.
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu avais peur ici.

translation.en: You talking to your ghost friend? How does he look? Is he hideous?
translation.fr: Tu parles à ton ami fantôme ?Il est hideux ?

translation.en: -He can see you. -No, he can't.
translation.fr: - Il peut te voir.- Non, il peut pas.

translation.en: What?
Uh... What do you want?
A normal sister, for starters.
Stop being weird and come eat.
He couldn't see you.
Yeah. I mean, that's... -usually how ghosts work. -[Reggie] Hmm.
translation.fr: Oui. C'est comme çaque ça marche avec les fantômes.

translation.en: Look, I'm very sorry for what happened to you guys,
translation.fr: Je suis désoléede ce qui vous est arrivé,

translation.en: but this isn't your studio anymore.
You have to leave.
But wait. We...
-We didn't get your name. -It's Julie.
Cool. [chuckles] I-I'm Luke,
by... by the way.
-And this is-- -Reggie. I'm Reggie.
-Hey. -[Luke] And...
Alex. How's it going?
OK?
Julie seems nice.
Did you miss the part where she kicked us out, or...
translation.fr: Tu es sourd ? Elle vient de nous virer.

translation.en: Yes. OK.
There we go!
OK.
-Let's do this. -Let's do it.
Your turn, Carlos.
Thank you for our leftovers and the power of the mighty microwave.
translation.fr: Merci pour nos resteset le tout puissant micro-ondes.

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
So...
Carlos tells me he found you in the studio.
translation.fr: Carlos dit que tu étais dans le studio.

translation.en: She was out there talking to herself.
I was rehearsing for a play.
[woman] Hello, hello!
Oh, busted!
Yeah, we're in here. Quick!
Spaghetti. Again?
Yeah.
That's too bad.
I brought you my pasteles and arroz con pollo.
translation.fr: J'ai apporté mes pasteleset de la paella au poulet.

translation.en: -Yum. -[Julie] Mm!
Thanks, tia. It smells great.
You can have it tomorrow.
I can't let you have leftovers every night.
translation.fr: Pas de restes tous les soirs.

translation.en: My sister would kill me, may she rest in peace.
translation.fr: Ma sœur me tuerait.Qu'elle repose en paix.

translation.en: Oh... I see things here are going better?
translation.fr: Je vois que ça se passe mieux.

translation.en: Actually...
...Julie has been cleaning out mom's studio.
translation.fr: Julie nettoie le studio de maman.

translation.en: Hopefully, we can get the house on the market and some offers soon.
translation.fr: J'espère pouvoir mettre la maisonen vente bientôt.

translation.en: Well, I like the sound of that.
Moving from here is only gonna help you move on.
You've got to rip that Band-Aid off and get the pain over with.
translation.fr: Il vaut mieux arracher le pansementd'un coup.

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] That's me. Ripping off the Band-Aid.
translation.fr: Je fais semblant d'arracher le pansement.

translation.en: There's my brave girl.
Hey, Julie, I really like what you guys did with the place.
-You shouldn't be here. -[aunt gasps]
Oh, I'm just here to help, mija.
translation.fr: Je suis là pour vous aider, ma belle.

translation.en: Oh... I think that's our cue to leave.
I mean, you should be at Pilates.
translation.fr: Enfin, et ton cours de pilates, alors ?

translation.en: -Thanks for bringing us food. -Oh. [chuckles]
-We should've called first. -[aunt] It's nothing.
translation.fr: - On aurait dû appeler.- C'est rien.

translation.en: And now that you're no longer in the music program,
translation.fr: Tu ne suis plusle cursus musique,

translation.en: you can concentrate on classes that matter.
translation.fr: donc tu peux te concentrersur les cours importants.

translation.en: You got the e-mail from the school, right?
translation.fr: Tu as eu le mail de l'école ?

translation.en: Yeah.
We're still discussing it.
Bueno. I'm off to Pilates.
-Mwah! -Oh yeah!
Wa-chow! It's gone.
So, Julie,
wanna hear how I slid into home and was almost safe?
translation.fr: Je te parle de mon match de base-ball ?

translation.en: You're a good brother. That's not gonna work.
I tried.
Why didn't you tell me? You made me lie to your aunt.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu l'as pas dit ?J'ai menti à ta tante.

translation.en: Sorry. I was gonna tell you after dinner.
translation.fr: Pardon.J'allais te le dire après le dîner.

translation.en: -Yeah. Mm-hmm. -I was.
Honey, I know those classes can be difficult,
translation.fr: Chérie, je sais que ces courspeuvent être difficiles,

translation.en: but you still like music, don't you?
translation.fr: mais tu aimes la musique, non ?

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
Look, we talked about this, you know? And how painful memories can be, but...
translation.fr: On en a parlé. Et combienles souvenirs peuvent être douloureux.

translation.en: You know, every time I see you and Carlos, I see Mom.
translation.fr: Carlos et toi me rappelez maman.

translation.en: It's like she's right here with us.
translation.fr: C'est comme si elle était là.

translation.en: But you know what? I love that. I do.
translation.fr: Mais tu sais quoi ? J'adore ça.

translation.en: And maybe if you'd give yourself a chance,
translation.fr: Et si tu te donnes une chance,

translation.en: you'll get there.
What's that?
I must have left the stereo on in the garage.
translation.fr: J'ai dû laisser la musique dans le garage.

translation.en: I'll go get it.
[yells] Guys! Guys, stop!
Enough! Stop! Cut it out!
The whole neighborhood could hear you. I thought I told you to leave.
translation.fr: Tout le quartier vous entend.Je vous ai dit de partir.

translation.en: Wait. People can hear us play?
Yes! And so did my dad and my brother!
translation.fr: Oui ! Et mon père et mon frère aussi !

translation.en: W-W-Wait. Wait. So, only you can see us,
translation.fr: Attends. Tu es la seule à nous voir ?

translation.en: but everyone can hear us?
translation.fr: Mais tout le monde nous entend ?

translation.en: -I mean, what kind of ghosts are we? -Who cares, man? People can hear us play!
translation.fr: - On est quel genre de fantômes ?- Les gens nous entendent !

translation.en: We might be dead, but our music isn't.
translation.fr: On est morts, mais pas notre musique.

translation.en: Dad!
Hey.
Just making sure you're OK.
Yeah, I'm fine. I just had to turn off the CD player.
translation.fr: Oui. C'était juste le lecteur CD.

translation.en: Wait. Is this the junk that was in the loft?
Junk?
Some of this stuff's in pretty good shape.
Hey, maybe we can make a couple bucks.
translation.fr: On peut en tirer quelques dollars.

translation.en: What? Yo, stop touching my drums. Tell him to stop touching my drums.
translation.fr: Touchez pas à ma batterie.Dis-lui d'arrêter d'y toucher.

translation.en: I liked that song you had on.
-Sweet! We're Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.fr: - On est les Sunset Curve.- Parlez de nous.

translation.en: It's just an old CD I found.
translation.fr: C'est un vieux CD que j'ai trouvé.

translation.en: Well, still, it's nice that you're listening to music again.
translation.fr: C'est bien que tu réécoutes de la musique.

translation.en: Out here you can play whatever you want, whenever you want.
translation.fr: Tu peux jouer ce que tu veux,quand tu veux.

translation.en: That's nice!
Stay out of this.
I-I'm sorry, honey. I didn't...
Oh no, no, no, no. Not you. I mean... Uh... Er...
You know, give me a minute.
We'll figure out this music program thing.
Thanks, Dad.
-He likes our song. -Oh yeah. He doesn't count.
translation.fr: - Il aime notre chanson.- Ça compte pas.

translation.en: He's a dad.
Why can't you guys just be normal ghosts?
translation.fr: Vous pouvez être des fantômes normaux ?

translation.en: Hang out at an old mansion. I hear Pasadena's nice.
translation.fr: Allez hanter un vieux manoir.Pasadena est sympa.

translation.en: I think she's warming up to us.
Yeah, I've always wanted to go to Pasadena.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours voulu aller à Pasadena.

translation.en: Stop that. I'm serious.
Oh, I'm sorry.
What do you want?
I know this is all completely insane, but you do know how rad this is?
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est dingue,mais tu réalises combien c'est génial.

translation.en: People... Actual people can hear us play.
Yeah, it's just I've just had a really, really awful day.
translation.fr: Super. Mais je viens de passerune mauvaise journée.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -Well, I'm sorry you had a bad day,
translation.fr: - Je dois y aller.- Désolé pour ta journée.

translation.en: but three guys just found out that they had a bad 25 years,
translation.fr: Mais tu viens pas de passer25 mauvaises années.

translation.en: and then they found out that the one thing they lived for
translation.fr: Alors imagine découvrir que tu peux continuerd'exercer ta passion.

translation.en: in the first place they can still do.
translation.fr: que tu peux continuerd'exercer ta passion.

translation.en: That's pretty rad.
You're right.
-It's just... -Your bad day.
Yeah. I know.
Look, I'm sorry we came into your life,
but...
what I just felt in there actually made me feel alive again.
translation.fr: ce que j'ai ressentime fait me sentir vivant.

translation.en: We all felt alive again.
So, you can kick us out if you want, but we're not giving up music.
translation.fr: Tu peux nous virer,mais on n'abandonne pas la musique.

translation.en: We can play again.
That's a gift no musician would ever turn down.
translation.fr: Aucun musicienne peut refuser un tel cadeau.

translation.en: You gotta know that.
Clearly, your mom is into music.
Was.
She passed away.
I am...  so sorry.
[Alex] Yeah, we... we didn't know.
It's all right.
You guys haven't seen her anywhere, have you?
From wherever you're from.
No. No, I mean, you're kind of the first person we've seen.
translation.fr: Non. Tu es la première personnequ'on a vue.

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not dead, so it doesn't answer her question.
translation.fr: Vivante,donc ça ne répond pas à sa question.

translation.en: Yeah. I think she knows what we mean.
translation.fr: Elle a compris ce que je voulais dire.

translation.en: I'm sorry for your loss.
Thanks.
Sorry I got mad.
You guys are kinda good.
Kinda?
Y-Y-You know that's like 25 years of rust just getting dusted off.
translation.fr: On est un peu rouillés après 25 ans.

translation.en: -Yeah. Do you play the piano too? -[Julie] No.
translation.fr: - Tu joues aussi du piano ?- Non.

translation.en: No, I don't play. That was my mom's stuff in there.
translation.fr: Je ne joue pas.C'était les trucs de ma mère.

translation.en: No way. She's an amazing songwriter.
She was.
Wait. How would you know?
There's a song on the piano. If it's hers...
translation.fr: Il y a une chanson à elle sur le piano.

translation.en: Your mom was really talented.
I guess...  if you need a place to stay,
translation.fr: J'imagine... qu'il vous faut un toit.

translation.en: you can stay in there.
There's a bathroom in the back
translation.fr: Il y a une salle de bain

translation.en: and a couch that turns into a bed if you still use any of that stuff.
translation.fr: et un canapé-lit,si vous utilisez encore ça.

translation.en: Dibs on the shower!
I just really like showers and sometimes the occasional bath.
translation.fr: J'aime les douches et parfois un bon bain.

translation.en: This...
This is just too weird.
Yeah.
[Julie] "What would you say if I told you
there are three ghosts living in my mom's studio?"
translation.fr: que trois fantômes viventdans le studio de ma mère ?"

translation.en: You'd say I'm crazy.
Hey, I know being dead isn't our first choice,
translation.fr: On n'a pas choisi d'être morts,

translation.en: but, I mean, it sure is easy getting around.
translation.fr: mais c'est plutôt facile de s'y habituer.

translation.en: Easy for you, maybe.
I lost my shirt on that one.
Ooh, never mind! There it is.
translation.fr: J'ai rien dit. Il est là.

translation.en: OK, so,  why'd you bring us here?
translation.fr: Bon, pourquoi tu nous amènes ici ?

translation.en: Just another painful reminder of where we never got to play.
translation.fr: Pour nous montrer un autre endroitoù on n'a pas joué ?

translation.en: -Thanks, Luke. -I mean, boys, the game isn't over yet.
translation.fr: - Merci, Luke.- Les gars, c'est pas fini.

translation.en: I'm telling you, we've been given a second chance.
translation.fr: Je vous le dis,il s'agit d'une deuxième chance.

translation.en: Let's find some music.
Let's see how many clubs we can hit before sunrise.
translation.fr: Combien de boîteson peut faire en une nuit ?

translation.en: Hey!
[Luke] Hey, Alex. You coming?
Let's go!
Guys?
Guys?
♪ Here's one thing ♪
♪ I want you to know ♪
♪ You got someplace to go ♪
translation.fr: Tu as un endroit où aller

translation.en: ♪ Life's a test, yes But you go toe-to-toe ♪
translation.fr: La vie est une épreuveMais tu dois y faire face

translation.en: ♪ You don't give up, no You grow ♪
♪ And you use your pain ♪
♪ 'Cause it makes you you ♪
♪ Though I wish I could hold you through it ♪
translation.fr: J'aimerais pouvoir te tenir la main

translation.en: ♪ I know it's not the same ♪
♪ You got living to do ♪
♪ And I just want you to do it ♪
translation.fr: Et je veux que tu le fasses

translation.en: ♪ So get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.fr: Alors, lève-toi et marcheRallume ce feu en toi

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
translation.fr: Tu connais le reste par cœur

translation.en: ♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.fr: Cherche autour de toiRegarde en toi

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
translation.fr: Peu importe ce que tu perds

translation.en: ♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.fr: Tu as plus à y gagnerÉlever ta voix sous la pluie

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
[Julie continues singing] ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.fr: Cherche autour de toiRegarde en toi

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
translation.fr: Peu importe ce que tu perds

translation.en: ♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.fr: Rallume ce feu en toiIl est temps de sortir de l'ombre

translation.en: ♪ Wake up ♪
♪ Wake up ♪
♪ Better wake those demons ♪
♪ Just look them in the eye ♪
♪ No reason not to try ♪
translation.fr: Aucune raison de ne pas essayer

translation.en: ♪ Life can be a mess ♪
♪ I won't let it cloud my mind ♪
translation.fr: Elle ne m'empêchera pas de voir

translation.en: ♪ I'll let my fingers fly ♪
translation.fr: Mes doigts voleront sur le piano

translation.en: ♪ And I use the pain ♪
♪ 'Cause it's part of me ♪
♪ And I'm ready to power through it ♪

♪ 'Cause you showed me how to do it ♪
